description: This file contains unit tests for the NativeScript project template in the universalinit package. It tests template initialization info, project structure creation, post-processing script execution, configuration loading, and template variable replacement.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock NativeScript template directory with configuration and resource files.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a sample project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_nativescript_init_info
methods.description: Verifies that the template provides correct initialization info.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the creation of a NativeScript project structure and verifies key files and content.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Checks that the post-processing script runs and produces expected output.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Tests loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Ensures template variables are correctly replaced in files during project initialization.
